statements: SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT site_name, longitude, latitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -80.0;
SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE latitude > 40.12345678;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE longitude < -70.12345678;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT * FROM site_coordinates WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM site_coordinates WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, longitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, measurement_date, latitude, longitude FROM site_coordinates WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_name LIKE 'L%';
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name, activity_type FROM landfill_sites JOIN site_activity ON landfill_sites.site_id = site_activity.site_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;

SELECT s.site_name, c.coordinate_name, sa.activity_type FROM landfill_sites s JOIN landfill_coordinates c ON s.site_id = c.site_id JOIN site_activity sa ON s.site_id = sa.site_id WHERE sa.timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT s.site_name, c.coordinate_name, sa.activity_type FROM landfill_sites s JOIN landfill_coordinates c ON s.site_id = c.site_id JOIN site_activity sa ON s.site_id = sa.site_id WHERE c.latitude BETWEEN 10.5 AND 20.5;

SELECT s.site_name, c.coordinate_name, sa.activity_type FROM landfill_sites s JOIN landfill_coordinates c ON s.site_id = c.site_id JOIN site_activity sa ON s.site_id = sa.site_id WHERE sa.activity_type LIKE '%cleanup%' ORDER BY sa.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, coordinates FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, location_geom FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM landfill_coordinates ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT site_name, log_date FROM landfill_sites JOIN landfill_logs ON landfill_sites.site_id = landfill_logs.site_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, location_geom FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_name LIKE '%landfill%';
SELECT * FROM landfill_coordinates WHERE latitude > 45 AND longitude < -120;
SELECT site_name, log_info FROM landfill_sites JOIN landfill_logs ON landfill_sites.site_id = landfill_logs.site_id;
SELECT site_name, date_recorded FROM landfill_sites JOIN landfill_tracking ON landfill_sites.site_id = landfill_tracking.site_id WHERE opened = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, longitude, latitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_location = 'City A';

SELECT site_name, waste_type_name, quantity FROM landfill_sites JOIN waste_disposal_records ON landfill_sites.site_id = waste_disposal_records.site_id JOIN waste_types ON waste_disposal_records.waste_type_id = waste_types.waste_type_id;
SELECT manager_name, disposal_date FROM site_managers JOIN waste_disposal_records ON site_managers.manager_id = waste_disposal_records.manager_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location, longitude, latitude FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location, longitude, latitude FROM landfill_sites WHERE longitude > 0;

SELECT ls.site_name, sm.manager_name, wt.waste_type_name, wr.quantity, wr.disposal_date FROM landfill_sites ls JOIN site_managers sm ON ls.site_id = sm.manager_id JOIN waste_disposal_records wr ON ls.site_id = wr.site_id JOIN waste_types wt ON wr.waste_type_id = wt.waste_type_id;

SELECT ls.site_name, ls.site_location, wdc.category_name, wr.quantity, wr.disposal_date FROM landfill_sites ls JOIN waste_disposal_records wr ON ls.site_id = wr.site_id JOIN waste_types wt ON wr.waste_type_id = wt.waste_type_id JOIN landfill_site_categories wdc ON wt.waste_type_id = wdc.category_id ORDER BY wr.quantity DESC;
